title: CHAMPION IS STUCK
body:
Dear Support Team,

Hope you can help me.

I have a big problem, my champion cannot move when I click the right bottom. I can still do everything else, I can buy and sell items with my mouse and at the shop my mouse works. I tried to create custom games and do literally everything, recall and use the shadow of zed. I can even flash in any direction I want but still my champion doesn't move.

Could you please help me? 

Many thanks
Seb

replies.body:
It sounds like this may be an issue with your input file that's saved server-side. Let's try a reset of this file with the following steps:

First, **log into the game** then hop into your Config folder, which should be located in this directory: 

> **C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config**

Delete these two files:
**- input.ini
- PersistedSettings.json**

Once you've deleted these two files, hop into a custom match to see if the change went through. Let me know if this caused any change!
